header.about: Self-taught and passionate about the web ecosystem. I design and develop solid and modern solutions, for all kind of needs: design, front, back, CI/CD; no matter the area where you need a solution, I can provide it.

portfolio.description: Web-based pizza ordering platform built with microservices. Leveraging cutting-edge technologies to create an intuitive platform for users to customize and order pizzas online.

portfolio.altImage: Sign in page for bank account
portfolio.description: Transactions system with the ability to automate transactions, search them with filters based on name, date and type of transaction.
